thread.title: Chrissy Teigen & John Legend's Daughter Had the Best Weekend at Aquarium & NBA All-Star Game -- See the Pics!
thread.title_full: Chrissy Teigen & John Legend's Daughter Had the Best Weekend at Aquarium & NBA All-Star Game -- See the Pics!

author: Zach Seemayer
title: Chrissy Teigen & John Legend's Daughter Had the Best Weekend at Aquarium & NBA All-Star Game -- See the Pics!
text: Chrissy Teigen & John Legend's Daughter Had the Best Weekend at Aquarium & NBA All-Star Game -- See the Pics! by Zach Seemayer 7:41 PM PST, February 20, 2017 Photo: Instagram Baby Luna couldn't be any cuter! John Legend and Chrissy Teigen treated their 10-month-old daughter to one super fun weekend, jetting off to Houston and New Orleans! A post shared by chrissy teigen (@chrissyteigen) on Feb 17, 2017 at 4:33pm PST On Sunday, little Luna was in New Orleans at the Smoothie King Center with Legend for the NBA All-Star Game. The "Love Me Now" singer shared this precious pic of his little girl sitting in his lap -- while rocking pink sound-dampening earmuffs -- and watching the game. "Basketball with baby Luna," the 38-year-old musician captioned the sweet snapshot. A post shared by John Legend (@johnlegend) on Feb 19, 2017 at 5:38pm PST WATCH: Chrissy Teigen and John Legend's Daughter Luna Blows Valentineâ€™s Kisses Legend was in NOLA to perform at the All-Star game, where he took the stage during the halftime show and performed a medley of his hits. Recently, Teigen sat down with ET in New York City, where she opened up about the challenges of finding a way to spend quality time with her husband while raising a baby and navigating their busy schedules. WATCH: John Legend Reveals Daughter Luna Is Already Crawling, Wants 'a Couple More' Kids With Chrissy Teigen "We're very lucky to be able to do that," Teigen said. "Not a lot of people can do that: can go on date nights, can have a sitter, have someone take care of their baby. 'Me time' is important, but not everybody can do it." Check out the video below to hear more. RELATED SLIDESHOW
